Package org.webpki.cbor

Class CBORMap

java.lang.Object
org.webpki.cbor.CBORObject
org.webpki.cbor.CBORMap
public class CBORMap extends CBORObject
Class for holding CBOR map objects.

  • Constructor Summary

    CBORMap()
    Creates an empty CBOR map.

    • getKeys

      public CBORObject[] getKeys()
      Enumerates all keys in a map.
      Returns:
      Array of keys

    • readBytesAndRemoveKey

      public byte[] readBytesAndRemoveKey(CBORObject key)
      Reads a byte string value, then deletes key.

      If key is not present or the mapped data is not a CBOR byte string, a CBORException is thrown.

      This method is provided for supporting the validation phase of enveloped cryptographic constructs like CSF and CEF.

      Parameters:
      key - Key
      Returns:
      byte string

    • setBytes

      public CBORMap setBytes(CBORObject key, byte[] byteString)
      Sets a byte string value.

      If key is not present a CBORException is thrown.

      This convenience method is provided for supporting cryptographic constructs like CSF and CEF.

      Parameters:
      key - Key
      byteString - Byte string
      Returns:
      this
